## Properties

| Property          | Attribute | Description                                                                 | Type                                              | Default     |
| ----------------- | --------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `if` _(required)_ | `if`      | A JS-based expression to capture data from the the data model.              | `string`                                          | `undefined` |
| `is`              | `is`      | The optional comparison operator. If omitted, general ‘truthiness’ is used. | `"eq" \| "gt" \| "gte" \| "lt" \| "lte" \| "not"` | `undefined` |
| `to`              | `to`      | The optional value for comparison.                                          | `any`                                             | `undefined` |
